text: {"grade": 1, "reasoning": "The candidate answer explicitly identifies that the review board will likely find Spain violated Article 5 of the Convention due to the unmarked anchored lines. The reasoning quotes Article 5 directly: \"Article 5 states: 'Nets, lines and other gear anchored in the sea and nets or lines which drift in the sea shall be marked in order to indicate their position and extent.'\"", "criterion_id": "criterion 2"}
